TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit UrlAttribute extends System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.ContextAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class UrlAttribute Inherits ContextAttribute

summary.span: 定義屬性 (Attribute)，這屬性可用於呼叫站台以指定將發生啟動過程 (Activation) 的 URL。

span.span: Defines an attribute that can be used at the call site to specify the URL where the activation will happen.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當做參數傳入的啟用屬性陣列何時建立啟用物件方法。The is passed in the activation attributes array as a parameter to when creating activated objects with the method. 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明使用中設定用戶端啟用遠端執行功能。The following code example illustrates the use of the in setting up client-activated remoting. 此範例包含三個部分： 用戶端、 伺服器，以及供用戶端和伺服器的遠端物件。The example contains three parts: a client, a server, and a remote object that is used by the client and server. 下列程式碼範例示範的用戶端：The following code example shows a client: [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute/CPP/client.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute/CS/client.cs#0)] 下列程式碼範例會顯示伺服器的用戶端：The following code example shows a server for this client: [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute/CPP/server.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute/CS/server.cs#2)] 下列程式碼範例顯示由用戶端和伺服器的遠端物件：The following code example shows the remote object that is used by the client and the server: [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute/CPP/remoteobject.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute/CS/remoteobject.cs#3)]

summary.span: 在指定的 URL 強制建立內容和內容中的伺服器物件。

span.span: Forces the creation of the context and the server object inside the context at the specified URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 並沒有提供任何屬性，以新的內容，因為它強制的內容和指定的 URL 在內容中的伺服器物件的建立供遠端執行功能基礎結構。 does not contribute any properties to the new context because it is used by the remoting infrastructure to force the creation of the context and the server object inside the context at the specified URL.
